alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 24 at 3:33AM MDT until October 25 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches, US-12 below 4500 feet trace to 3 inches. * WHERE...Bitterroot/Sapphire Mountains. * WHEN...From 3 PM Monday to noon MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL IMPACTS...Backcountry enthusiasts and hunters should be prepared for wintry conditions and the potential for hypothermia if caught in a storm unprepared.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
